briefTitle: Mantram Repetition Meditation for Veterans With PTSD
officialTitle: Portable Mantram Meditation for Veterans With Military Related PTSD
summary: The aim of this study was to determine the usefulness of a portable, meditation-based intervention called the Mantram Repetition Program (MRP) for Veterans with military-related posttraumatic stress disorder (PTSD). This study compared the individual delivery of the MRP to individual delivery of Present-Centered Therapy (PCT) at two sites in San Diego, California, and Bedford, Massachusetts.

primaryOutcome.measure: Clinician-Administered PTSD Scale (CAPS) Diagnostic and Statistical Manual, 4th ed., Text Revision (DSM-IV)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline to post-treatment (week 8); Baseline to 2 months post-treatment.
